channel.title: Hey, KTHillman here
channel.description:
Well, I figured since there was no introduction.. that I would go ahead and introduce myself here. I've been a member of moparscape before. I was a programmer and was very active. I've enjoyed rsps for about 9 years almost now. I used to have another registered name, but i wouldn't even remember the name/password/email if i saw it. Anyways last time I quit, I was working on a 317 server base. I was trying to make the server as much like the old "bronzescape" from when 317 was the shit. Haha... and i still have it on my flash drive, along with some other stuff like mopar server thats epicly AMAZING, and i MIGHT release both of them!
Alrighty, KTH.

item.title: Hey, KTHillman here
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Well, welcome back. However ‘Welcome back’ topics are not allowed, and also this topic has too much potential for spam, so I’m locking it.

item.title: Hey, KTHillman here
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

-Nothing:

Uhm. those who call him a liar…The RSPS sections were located at moparisthebest before the moparisthebest.com was set up. But I don’t remember any ‘bronzescape’ servers from back then. all I remember is the PimpScape, and MegaScape.

Still wasn’t 8 years ago. If he was ‘around’ 8 years ago, he should know what kaitneks(spelling?) is.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, KTHillman here
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:4, topic:433949"][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=536655.msg3925403#msg3925403 date=1330173236]

if thats late, i wonder what ya bed time is ;p

Mine is 8 0’clock. Studies show you get your best sleep before midnight. Studies also show, you grow while you sleep. The more you sleep, the more you grow. Of course genetics and other factors come into the equation but to be overall healthier, “early to bed, early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise”.
[/quote]

Studies show that fugly nerds sleep at 8.

Superior master races sleep at 12-1am.[/quote]

But I’m blond haired, blue eyed, and german…?

Read full topic

[quote author=m1lkman link=topic=536655.msg3924523#msg3924523 date=1330088232]

Actually about a year ago ain’t was added to the Websters dictionary. It is now a word. So gtfo.

Don’t say ain’t or your mama will faint and your daddy will fall in a bucket of paint

Haha, 7:15 is late? o.O[/quote]I start drinking around 4-5pm every night

item.title: Hey, KTHillman here
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:433949"]9 years
you lie
YOU FUCKING LIE
[size=14pt]GET THE FUCK OUT[/size][/quote]
9 years…?
If this guy coded for 9 years, he would be Andrew-fucking-Gower. The REAL RS2 was released in Jan 2001. (11 years ago…) The first RSPS (Made for testing Bots, and was coded like crap) was released in 2006, named WinterLove. (In which case he did invent wL, he would have only coded for 6 or so years).
So, GTFO, and lie on rune-serber. -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, KTHillman here
item.dc:creator: @Advocatus Advocatus
item.description:
@Advocatus wrote:

At the people above me. He didnt specify whether it was a rsc private server or rs2.
The first rs2 server was written as a 317 emulator and happened around 05.

I am a bit hazy on the history of rsc private servers. But I would assume that they were already made.

Thats around 7 years for rs2 private servers and what ever else for rsc ones. 9 might be a somewhat overestimate, but its not that bad that he should “get the fuck out”.

Read full topic
